title: Understanding ASD
text: Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) is a developmental disorder that affects communication and behavior. It is called a 'spectrum' because there is a wide variation in the type and severity of symptoms people experience.

title: Strengths and Needs
text: Children with ASD can have a range of strengths and needs. Some may excel in certain areas like mathematics or art, while others may need support with social interactions or communication.

title: Evaluating the Statement
text: Consider whether all children with ASD have the same strengths and needs. Think about the diversity within the spectrum.
